seed_pair.known: I don't understand what you said.

S0069: No quería cuidar el perro joven toda la tarde.
He didn't want to look after the young dog all afternoon.
S0070: Ella no quería decirme dónde estaba.
She didn't want to tell me where it was.
S0071: No queríamos permitir que nadie oyera la verdad
We didn't want to let anyone hear the truth.
S0072: Pienso que estás haciendo muy bien
I think that you're doing very well.
S0073: Muchas gracias, pero tengo más que aprender
Thank you very much, but I've got more to learn.
S0074: Muchas gracias por ayudarme a comprender
Thank you very much for helping me to understand.
S0075: Have you got more to learn?
S0076: Estoy muy feliz con cuánto he aprendido ya
I'm very happy with how much I've learnt already.
S0077: Estoy sorprendido de lo rápidamente que estoy comenzando a comprender
I'm surprised at how quickly I'm starting to understand.
